lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article on Thursday about the surprising early success of the Florida Marlins misstated, in some editions, the scheduled length of their series this week with the Cincinnati Reds. It was four games, not three. (They played only three games because the finale on Thursday was postponed because of rain.).
